name: Exploration City Craft
description:
Exploration City Craft is a 3D sandbox game about building your own cities.

In Exploration craft, the creative mode offers an enjoyable way to explore unique tropical block worlds and establish your villages with unlimited blocks and resources !
On top of many pre made builds available, you also can obtain pets and mounts such as horse, flying dragons... and many other craft !
You can create your own city, customize your character/skins...
